description: This file is a server entry point for a Remix-based web application, handling HTTP requests, distinguishing between bot and browser clients, and managing server-side rendering streams.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main request handler that sets CORS headers, manages OPTIONS preflight, and delegates requests to bot or browser handlers based on user-agent.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for bot clients, streams HTML content, and manages rendering errors.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for browser clients, streams HTML content, and manages rendering errors.
